擲.definition: to toss; to throw dice; Taiwan pr. [zhi2]

擲地有聲.definition: lit. if thrown on the floor, it will make a sound (idiom); fig. (of one's words) powerful and resonating; to have substance

擲筊.definition: poe divination, a traditional Chinese divination method where a pair of crescent-shaped wooden or bamboo blocks is thrown on the ground, with the positions of the blocks determining the divine answer

擲還.definition: please return (an item sent in the mail)
